#!/bin/bash
# Sinusbot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install ca-certificates bzip2 wget tar
apt -q clean all

#Create needed directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server/TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64/plugins
mkdir /mnt/server/youtube-dl

cd /mnt/server

#Download Sinusbot
wget -qO - https://www.sinusbot.com/pre/sinusbot-0.13.37-f7e9ece.tar.bz2 | tar xj

#Install Sinusbot
chmod +x sinusbot
cp config.ini.dist config.ini
sed -i "s|^TS3Path.*|TS3Path = \"/home/container/TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64/ts3client_linux_amd64\"|g" config.ini
echo 'YoutubeDLPath = "/home/container/youtube-dl/youtube-dl"' >> config.ini
#cp scripts scripts_org

#Install Sinusbot plugin
cp plugin/libsoundbot_plugin.so TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64/plugins

#Download TeamSpeak Client
TSVERSION=$(wget -q -O - http://dl.4players.de/ts/releases/ | grep -Po '(?<=href=")[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+){2,3}(?=/")' | sort -Vr | head -1)
wget -q "http://dl.4players.de/ts/releases/$TSVERSION/TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64-$TSVERSION.run"

# Install TeamSpeak Client
chmod +x TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64-$TSVERSION.run
./TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64-$TSVERSION.run --tar xfv -C TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64
rm TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64-$TSVERSION.run
# Remove glx-integration lib
rm TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64/xcbglintegrations/libqxcb-glx-integration.so

#Download youtube-dl
cd /mnt/server/youtube-dl
wget -q https://yt-dl.org/downloads/latest/youtube-dl
chmod a+rx youtube-dl
